Dead by Daylight neboli DBD je multiplayerová hororová hra u které strávíte několik zábavných, ale i frustrujících hodin. Hru doporučuji hrát s přáteli, pokud nemáte přátelé xD tak máte možnost hrát sólo za Přeživšího nebo za Killera. 

Přeživší mají za úkol nastartovat všechny generátory a utéct (zní to jednoduše, ale...každý kdo si kdy DBD zahrál pochopí jak to může být náročné, strašidelné a nervy drásající). Killer je pravou alfou na mapě a snaží se všechny přeživší chytit, pověsit na háky a jako poslední zabít dokud neutečou. 

Ať se hra stává postupem času stereotypní, tak dostala několik skvělých DLC, které zábavu z hraní prodlužují a každé nabízí originální atmosféru v podobě nových přeživších, killerů, map a dalších doplňků.

Dead by Daylight bych doporučil na 9/10.

I wish I could reccomend this game. It is a lot of fun, it's an interesting idea which is carried out well. But I can't, because at a certain point you will run into a brick wall made of players. You'll get killers who will sit on top of hooks. You'll get killers who will tunnel someone to death. You'll get survivors with so many thousands of hours ahead of you that you will never ever catch up. Auto aim will cheat you out of some hits. You'll find out that 9/10 when you go against a swf you don't stand a chance. And sometimes you'll run into a bug which will just make you helpless. The current one is survivors getting stuck on the big hill. I'd had this lose games for me as Surv and win games for me as Killer. And the combination will suck the fun out of the game. And then you realise you've played so many matches without an ounce of fun extracted and you'll hit this point. 
There are some very good killers and survivors out there who are fun to play against and fun to play with, but they're in the minority. The toxic community aspect is true, but that doesn't really bother me since two can play at that game. But until they fix the matchmaking, I think i'm done. After 172 hours I got to around rank 7 on Killer and Surv but I'm matched with rank 1 to rank 20. With the current matchmaking system, the time to get into the game was when it came out. If you're not discouraged by this, I wish you luck and you will have bad games here and there.

An update for 2022. The hill bug is fixed. Same kind of situation for SWF. Matchmaking also seems to be fixed. The game is really quite fun. I've encountered very few killers that will camp hooks, still some that tunnel people down but they're really in the minority. But it's still got problems. That brick wall I mentioned doesn't really seem to exist anymore. Toxic community is still there, but still doesn't bother me and it seems less compared to before. What does bother me is just how unstable this game is. It is extremely poorly optimised. I played through Fallout New Vegas recently, widely regarded as one of the buggiest and easy to crash games out there. Didn't have a problem. Dead by Daylight on the other hand, a game made more recently and still supported and worked on by the developers? That crashes a lot. And when it crashes, the game can't tell if you're crashing intentionally because you care about your rating (no one cares about their rating it gets reset every month) or if it was by accident, so you get banned. 

I've seen other people crash, i've crashed, everyone's crashed. It needs fixing. There are still glitches, the current ones are chests appearing which you can't interact with, and certain breakable walls turning into places you can teleport through. Oh and a fun one where you can end up stuck, unable to move or interact with anything for the rest of the game. That's the glitches. There's also the cheaters. Dead by Daylight uses an anti-cheat system which scans your files for any illicit changes and on that basis bans you. Perfectly fine with that. I find it very amusing that Easy Anti-Cheat claims to be the industry leader though, because it sucks. Look it up, you can find videos of cheaters online, play the game, sooner or later you'll run into someone using cheats to boost their speed. If they don't just teleport away of course. I've heard it described like this; Anti-cheat is a lock. Your unaltered files are the key. Cheaters get around this by going online and buying the code to just unlock the door regardless of their files. 

What I hope for now is this. That at some point someone else makes a game similar to this and they actually make it so it doesn't always have some bug or some glitch or something going wrong with it. I know BHVR won't.

Recomendable si:
1. No jugas de killer o gastas todos tus puntos de sangre en conseguir buenas perks e invertis 200 en cada asesino para pseudo intentar aprender a jugar (El juego esta completamente desbalanceado y la unica forma de "ganar" es utilizando lo mejorcito digamos, freddy, bubba, spiritu y con perks que son el equivalente de molestas por ejemplo strike=barbacoa, tiempo prestado=noed, chungo/dead hard=ruina, etc etc).
2. Vas de laucha...digo survivor en un team premade. (Darle cabezazos al teclado hasta que se abra la puerta de salida).
Es mucho mas frustrante ir de killer, dejando de lado a los t-baggers y los clicky clicky, aparte de que al final de la partida llueven mensajes de amor (not really) de parte de tus contrincantes, la toxicidad esta en todos lados... ojo que tambien hay killer ultra toxicos, pero que te caigan 3 motores en menos de 2 minutos no es para nada divertido, aunque te digan que el gen rush no sea real... spoiler(si lo es) que te metan pales en absoultamente en todos lados y demas cosas que si lo llegas a comprar y jugar vas a entender a menos que mainees laucha. En cambio si te matan de survivor, aparte de que subis de rango por cualquier cosa buscas otra partida y ya.
Nota: 6/10.

Dead By Daylight was a good game when i first got into it, this was near like the start of 2020. My good friend got me into it and said i should try it out so i did. I played it with him and had a blast it was very fun and addicting. I started playing killer and it was extremely fun too but it started getting boring after awhile. I haven't touched the game in a while and probably still wont because i just have no point in playing it. The game is a good game but it just started getting boring the devs never listen to the community and made their game way more broken every time they updated it. Instead of fixing the game they choose to make really shit cosmetics. Some of them are good but they are a shit ton of money but basically they add more cosmetics and its basically ruining their game. The community is on another level fr i can type all day about how fucking bad the community is especially on IG & Discord. The community in general is fucking trash people get offended way too easily with little jokes , people bully eachother for no reason, and one last thing the community likes doing is canceling people for no reason. The community is just pure shit every game has a bad community but DBD has a really toxic one. In general i would not get this game because first , your gonna get addicted , gonna join the community get attacked for no reason , leave the community get attacked again. this game was good but its just total pure shit now. anyways whoever is reading this have a good day.
